name: clone-class
description: Clone an ES6 Class as Another Class Name for Isolating Static Properties in the Classes.

scripts.lint:ts: npm run clean && echo tslint v`tslint --version` && tslint --project tsconfig.json "{bin,examples,scripts,src,tests}/**/*.ts" --exclude "tests/fixtures/**" --exclude "dist/" && tsc --noEmit
scripts.test:pack: npm run dist && export TMPDIR=/tmp/pack-testing.$$ && mkdir $TMPDIR && npm pack && mv *-*.*.*.tgz $TMPDIR && cp tests/fixtures/smoke-testing.js $TMPDIR && cd $TMPDIR && npm init -y && npm install *-*.*.*.tgz && node smoke-testing.js

author: Huan LI <zixia@zixia.net>
